queries.exists: SELECT 1 FROM programs WHERE name = 'Adobe Acrobat (64-bit)' AND publisher = 'Adobe';

refs.711949d2:
$exeFilePath = "${env:INSTALLER_PATH}"

try {

# Add argument to install silently
# Argument to make install silent depends on installer,
# each installer might use different argument (usually it's "/S" or "/s")
$processOptions = @{
  FilePath = "$exeFilePath"
  ArgumentList = "-sfx_nu /sAll /rs /msi"
  PassThru = $true
  Wait = $true
}
    
# Start process and track exit code
$process = Start-Process @processOptions
$exitCode = $process.ExitCode

# Prints the exit code
Write-Host "Install exit code: $exitCode"
Exit $exitCode

} catch {
  Write-Host "Error: $_"
  Exit 1
}
refs.9cd69460:
$product_code = {AC76BA86-1033-FF00-7760-BC15014EA700}

# Fleet uninstalls app using product code that's extracted on upload
msiexec /quiet /x $product_code
Exit $LASTEXITCODE
